website_summaries.verdict: The ideal pick if you are looking for an ultra-soft suit alongside aggressive warmth and coverage.
pros: Thick neoprene construction keeps users remarkably warm
Customers appreciate the strength and durability of the build
cons: Can run a bit long in sizing
Knees are reinforced, making it difficult for water sports that require sitting

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for kayaking. I'm 5'-11" tall 165 lbs and bought medium. They fit well; wetsuits should be close fitting and they are. The quality of construction exceeded my expectation for this price point. The stitching is very high quality with no loose threads anywhere. The seams are not sealed but for use in a kayak that isn't a big problem. For a wetsuit used for diving it would be a major problem because it would allow a lot of water to flow in and out of the pants reducing their insulation performance. Great value for the price and my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size chart, expect tight but not tourniquet tight
customer_reviews.text: Say what you want about 'cheap' wet suits. The fit? Perfect. Seams all appear perfect. Sizing was for a large (6'2" 198#) same as my full suit from same company. Any one that thinks they can 'just slide in' a good wetsuit is in for a shock. They are tight for a reason. If they aren't they will not protect you from water temperatures. When I arrived home, I jumped at the first chance to try them on. Tight and good fit. Jumped in a cold shower and soaked them down. Initial water was shockingly cold then the suit did its job and I didn't notice it anymore. These, with my drytop will be my fall/early spring kayaking suit.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but strange sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The lemorecn wetsuit pants are very good quality. The sizing is very off. My husband is 5'7" and weighs 150 lbs, the Small size were about 5" too short and so tight he could hardly manage to squeeze into them. Wetsuits are suppose to fit tight but this was beyond nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: funshine

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AND PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: These neoprene pants are amazing. The quality is superb and the fit perfect. I use them for water aerobics in the winter when my pool drops below 73F. They are stretchy and flexible enough to allow all my moves. I highly recommend these pants.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice if you are not looking to break the bank
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of men's wetsuit pants. Well constructed and nicely form fitting and not difficult to pull on. I found some videos on Youtube that were quite helpful in learning how to carefully pull them on and take them off without damaging the neoprene material. I am 5'6" tall and 190 lbs and the men's size large fit just right. There is a little extra up around my butt, but that is because I have a 29" inseam and a 36" waste. So, my proportions may not be typical. Have not used them yet but I suspect they will work perfectly when I am kayaking and fishing from my kayak in the colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sellati

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I ordered these to extend my shorty suit. They are high quality and fit really nice. I recommend for anyone looking to keep themselves warm in the water. I think I'll use them for running as well.
customer_reviews.author: Superman Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em. True to Size, Great Price, A little noisy and smelly
customer_reviews.text: Items a little smelly but I think that comes with neoprene territory. 🙂 I’m 5’9.5, probably 165 lbs these days and purchased size medium. They’re pretty snug getting them on, but from what I’ve read they loosen up in water. They’re perfectly comfortable. Such a great item for the price. I’ll try to remember to post back after they’ve been used. Anticipate using them for sit on top kayak this winter in Baja as well as some snorkeling and swimming. 😁 One more thing.. they do make a strange noise when walking but again, not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Stop Shopping Around
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me??? Surprisingly good quality, & excellent fit for a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: NumeroUno

customer_reviews.title: Size chart matters
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. High back & comfortable neoprene pants. Use the size chart to determine the size you should order and you should be fine. Testing will come in 2 weeks. I am confident they will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Thicker than I needed so I got the 1.5mm instead but if you need very thick, these are a great buy. I got 3x for 5’ 200 lb and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and Materials
customer_reviews.text: Size chart was correct to fit problem is they are not 100% neoprene as you think the backside may be a neoprene fiber like mesh not as pictured. Really thick as well the 3 mm is considerable weight more like 4 mm not for summer waters. Returned and bout 1.5mm type instead as 2mm is difficult to find in the marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a trip to FL to swim with the manatees. Amazing!! Much too long for me but I had to order such a big size to fit around me. Very good quality. Just wish they came in short fat people sizes...we like to have fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Maia Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Perfect. I am allergic to most wetsuits. I get a really bad dermatitits that lasts over 2 months. This is the only wetsuit that I can wear without any issues in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Romero

customer_reviews.title: They really do stretch alot
customer_reviews.text: When I took them out of the package I didn't think they would fit. They stretch alot but are a bit tight on the highest part of my legs. They aren't for very cold water but will do in early fall
customer_reviews.author: Born to shop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit good and very warm. The waist adjustment not the best through.
customer_reviews.author: Phuoc Minh Vu

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional deal!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! When can you pay so little for this kind of excellence? Durable knees and butt, and warmth as expected for 3mm. Great fit and I love the back waist that extends over the small of my back ... perfect for kayaking!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Seem to ride down
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly pulling them up when I'm on my SKI
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D. Fix

customer_reviews.title: The Pants Fit
customer_reviews.text: To help those of you considering a purchase. I just receive the pants an hour ago. I order the XL. It fit perfectly. I am 6' tall and weigh 205 pounds with a beer bally. The fit is snug but not uncomfortable. I am working on losing 10 pounds, so should fit even better later. I purchased it to keep me warm while Installing my dock in Lakeville Michigan, which I will start this weekend. I will report back to let you know how well it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: The pants are too low in the rise, which makes them very uncomfortable. In addition, the sizes do not run true. I do wear size L, bought XXL, and they are way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Orijox

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money. Kept me comfortable kayaking Lake Tahoe when the water was chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby L Ayres

customer_reviews.title: ... it is very thick and made very well - excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little large for a small but I am very small - it is very thick and made very well - excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: finaly the third try i got the right one. fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: gary d brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice, snug, and keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: These fit really well. I'm 5'7 and 150 lbs and these were nice and snug on me. I didn't have any problems with them in the water. The material is thick and kept my legs warm too. I've put them through the washer as well with no issues. Great set of pants!
customer_reviews.author: P. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They worked while we were hiking up the Subway train in Zion. Kept me warm, while we decided to walk in the river. Great fit and not too revealing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these wetsuit pants. Fit is great and they’re stretchy. Great for surfing when the water is cold but it’s warmer outside or kayaking on a kayak that your legs get wet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a size bigger than what you think.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was a little hesitant because I am 5'4 and weight 185lbs. Not a lot of options for my body habitus. I took a chance and bought the large and they were perfect. Can't wait to use them kayak fishing asthe weather cools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for SUP
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was very pleased with how they felt and fit. Great for SUP in cooler water.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: It works great but the back can be a little higher so ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great but the back can be a little higher so sand does not get in your underwear when getting in and out of the surf
customer_reviews.author: comp12

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit and Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing of this item isn't close to what its labeled as. I ordered a 3X and they look and fit like they are a medium. I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Miller

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: These seem like they are nice quality, but the small did not fit me. These seem to run really small, as I am an XS-S in all my other clothes. I gave them to my 9 year old niece and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Not sure anymore what to use those wetsuit pants for (sigh)
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pare of wetsuit pants. I thought these were suppose to be waterproof but I tested it in the shower my legs got water. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GUNTHER

customer_reviews.title: Decent pants, runs small
customer_reviews.text: The pants run small. The thickness and quality is good. But the high back is not very high.
customer_reviews.author: James Park

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: 6 foot 2 and 215lbs bought the large and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for some long pants .. fits good .. great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality. Suitable for summer wear. It is not warm in winter in California.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried a first about fitment but they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Cobraman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it but size it up very tight on legs and low waist line
customer_reviews.author: Eva E.Gellert

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the money. Used them to put in dock, spring time in Michigan. Fit a bit snugger that I thought for a triple x. Once I got into the water though, they were quite comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Great For Working out
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I work out, it helps me sweat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little on the snug side and a little less than 3 mm. Comfortable. I like the drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Trypuc

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but hard to tighten waist.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have tightened up the waist better, but otherwise, kept me warm in 60 degree water.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wet suit and comfortable to use I totally recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto L Buenaflor Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: did just what I wanted. Chose size carefully as they are a bit small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: 6’2” 170#. 35” waist, 39” hips. I ordered the Medium size and use it for aqua jogging. fit is perfect, not too loose, not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: The thickness in what season it is used, could be very warm in the summer time..
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for kayaking, no dislike what so ever..recommended it to others i kayak with..
customer_reviews.author: Angelito W. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: the thickness was nice and heavy duty the quality was great
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 5 even though I am returning it , the thickness was nice and heavy duty the quality was great. I usually wear a women's 8-10 but the 10 was too tight on my knees, and I have pencil legs. Also the waist is way low, though I have a thick waist flat butt and pencil legs and arms. Sad really.. its slightly higher in the back but 2-3 inches below the belly button not good for my middle, I'm 5'7'' 140 but do have some abdominal fat, if it just came up higher! I would order up but the size is not available:(
customer_reviews.author: TracyIN Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sized up but they will keep me warm in early spring kayaking weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider all attributes before selecting a size to order
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After reading all of the reviews on sizing- I was sure I had finally found something that would fit. I was wrong. I am a short stocky man with tree trunk legs. After a lot of struggling I was able to get the pants up over my legs. But then there wasn't enough material to cover the buttocks and stomach. So if you have bird legs and a skinny mid-drif and backside- these will fit you.
customer_reviews.author: FAITH

customer_reviews.title: Product is good I have yet to try Just if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good I have yet to try Just if you are an extra large order XXI for confort there than that is good quality I can't wait to try it in the water
customer_reviews.author: Pescador

customer_reviews.title: great pants and good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been diving yet in the pants so the real test is still to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Carlock

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Wetsuits Pants 3mm Neoprene Swimming Canoeing Pants
feature_bullets: INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY: 3mm ultra soft and super stretch neoprene; comfortable flat stitch construction gives you a soft and comfortable fit
WARMTH: Designed to keep you warm in all water conditions for standup paddle boarding, kiteboarding, wakeboarding, surfing, and other water sports.
PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT: Combination of two super elastic fabric gives an unparalleled mix of performance and comfort
UNISEX FIT: A layer to support men and women during paddle boarding, surfing, and other water activities.
High-waist and tall back offers increased coverage
